resources.string: Ques#1: What is Kotlin\'s interoperability with Java like?
Fully interoperable, allowing calling Kotlin code from Java and vice versa.
Limited interoperability, mainly one-way from Kotlin to Java.
No interoperability between Kotlin and Java.
Interoperability depends on the specific version of Kotlin used.
Ques#2: Which Kotlin feature helps prevent null pointer exceptions?
